V

viewInventory() - Method in class jdbcpostgreSQL2
Returns a string containing all the items in the inventory, and their assocaited count
viewRestock() - Method in class jdbcpostgreSQL2
Returns a string containing a list of items whose current inventory is less than the item's minimum amount to have around before needing to restock.
viewSales(String) - Method in class jdbcpostgreSQL2
Accepts a String, date, and returns all sales data from the corresponding inputed date.
viewTenPercentIngredients() - Method in class jdbcpostgreSQL2
Given a timestamp,returns a tring containing a list of items that only sold less than 10% of their inventory between the timestamp and the current time, assuming no restocks have happened during the window.
